welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Baohezhuangcun, China! This charming city is known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful destination has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nanyuan Airport, serving domestic flights within China.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Nanyuan Airport, primarily used for charter and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beijing Daxing International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Beijing Daxing International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network PKX_Free_WiFi.
